message: We proceed through narrow side streets until we reach the warehouse district.
The light and glamour of the main street is just a haze in the distance, and there's hardly anyone around.
After we're sure that no one is watching, we approach the back door of one warehouse.
One of the guys unlocks it with his Coil, and we step inside.
The warehouse is massive and filled with stacks of huge boxes.
As the door closes behind us, several men emerge from the shadows. The Beni-Shigure members who were waiting for us.
Backslaps are exchanged. Everyone starts celebrating the successful rendezvous.
The drug is finally starting to wear off. I can move again, so I sit down against the wall.
Still... what an ordeal.
As I'm resting, Koujaku walks up to me. He just finished talking with the others.

name: 紅雀
message: "You doing any better?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 紅雀
message: "Cool."
He sits down next to me.
I don't know what to say. I'd forgotten amid the craziness, but I still haven't figured out where the two of us stand.
Koujaku seems similarly at a loss.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Aoba."
Koujaku breaks the silence. He turns to look me in the eye.

name: 紅雀
message: "You gotta let me apologize first. I know it's not enough to make up for what happened, but..."

name: 紅雀
message: "I'm really sorry."
I feel my lips tighten. Is this how I want it to play out?
I've thought a lot about my relationship with Koujaku. There's a lot I want to say, and a lot I want to ask.
But I feel like I have to be the one to start.
I want to know more about Koujaku, but that means sharing my own feelings first.
I have to go at his pace, just like he's always done for me.
It can't be one-sided. We're not little kids anymore.
It's time for honesty.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I need to be straight with you about something."
A tinge of fear flashes across Koujaku's face.

name: 蒼葉
message: "So, like, we go back forever. I kinda felt like I knew everything about you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But the thing is... and I know I said this before, but... I didn't really know you at all."

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean, I was just stupid and full of myself... but realizing that... it really shook me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I thought... how could he hide something from me? From me. But that was wrong."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You've got your own shit to deal with. I'm sure you had your reasons... I never even considered that."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Instead, I pretended I understood. I told myself I had to trust you and wait... until you were ready to talk."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...But I couldn't. I couldn't stand it. I want to really know you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I wanna know where you were and what you were doing while you were off the island, and I wanna know what's going on with you now, too."

name: 蒼葉
message: "If you really don't want to talk, it's okay... Actually, no."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's not okay. I can't keep lying. ...Tell me, Koujaku. I want to know."
Koujaku looks down, saying nothing.
If he still refuses to tell me now, then it'll truly be time to throw in the towel.
I've said my piece. I'll accept whatever comes of it.
After what feels like an eternity, Koujaku slowly lifts his head and looks at me.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Okay, I'll talk. I didn't know I was making you feel that way. I didn't say anything because I didn't want to drag you into my shit."

<4line><voice name='紅雀' class='紅雀' src='voice/dm13/1000220a02'>
"And, to be honest, I was scared what would happen if you found out. Didn't matter in the end, though. You got pulled into this anyway. I have Ryuuhou to thank for that."

name: 紅雀
message: "So there's no point hiding it from you now. I'm ready. Hear me out."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I'm all ears."
We meet each other's eyes and exchange a nod.

name: 紅雀
message: "So, after we left the island, we went to live with my mom's family on the mainland."

name: 紅雀
message: "I've never told you this, but my family's actually yakuza."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Really?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah. I was heir to the family. Truth is, my mom was just the boss's mistress, but his wife couldn't have kids, so I ended up being the heir."

name: 紅雀
message: "But I had no interest in taking over... and the boss's wife? She made life hell for my mom. We moved to Midorijima to get away from all that."

name: 紅雀
message: "But it didn't last for long. They called us back... things happened, and my mom died."
His mother's dead...
I met her countless times when we were children. She was a kind and wonderful person.
The revelation is so sudden, I don't know what to say. Koujaku sighs.

name: 紅雀
message: "...You'd never seen the tattoo on my face before, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah... but I have seen the one on your back."

name: 紅雀
message: "You saw it? When?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "When you were washing your kimono in the bathroom after I puked on it."

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I was walking by and the door was open. I peeked in, not really thinking or anything, and that's when I saw it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I didn't mean to spy on you... Sorry."

name: 紅雀
message: "...Oh. Well, no harm no foul. Bet you were surprised."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, I guess."

name: 紅雀
message: "I got that one and the one on my face while I was back on the mainland. It wasn't my idea, though. Ryuuhou's the one who did 'em."

name: 紅雀
message: "Ryuuhou had gotten in good with my old man, the boss. He convinced him to have me tattooed."

name: 紅雀
message: "I didn't want to be saddled with this shit. I guess you could call it a karmic joke... but I didn't give a fuck about taking over the family."
He presses a hand to his forehead angrily, crumpling his bangs.

name: 紅雀
message: "And that fucker Ryuuhou... I was worried after I saw you talking to him, but I never thought he'd actually lay a hand on you."

name: 紅雀
message: "I thought my heart was gonna stop when I found you lying there. I told you to stay away, didn't I?"
Wait... After he saw me talking to Ryuuhou?

name: 蒼葉
message: "You mean... when I was talking to him outside the club?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah. It was a total coincidence, too. I'd been searching for him ever since we got here, and he just shows up like that..."

name: 紅雀
message: "You remember those girls who flagged me down when we came in?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 紅雀
message: "The tattoo on the blonde's neck was Ryuuhou's. I'd know his work anywhere. His ink always has this blueish tint."

name: 紅雀
message: "Anyway, I was sure he had to be close, so I thought I'd work her for information."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So that's why you left to go see her?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah. Sorry for putting you through all that, but honestly, I wasn't thinking of anything but Ryuuhou. He vanished after my mom died."

name: 紅雀
message: "With the tattoos and everything, I wanted to track him down. But I couldn't find him on the mainland no matter how hard I tried."

name: 紅雀
message: "I couldn't get him out of my head, and I couldn't stand the idea of dragging that baggage around forever... That's why I came back to Midorijima."

name: 紅雀
message: "But not only does he show up right under my nose, he even pulls that shit with you..."
He trails off there. A dark shadow falls over his eyes.

name: 紅雀
message: "...I can't let Ryuuhou get away with it. There's no way to get rid of a tattoo completely. I'm stuck with this shit for the rest of my life."

name: 紅雀
message: "He's the one who put the needle to my skin. He doesn't get a pass just because my old man gave the order."

name: 紅雀
message: "There's nothing that asshole loves more than inking people. And he doesn't give a shit about anything else."

name: 紅雀
message: "Cry or scream all you want, he'll work that needle with a smile on his face. He's just a fucking psycho."

name: 紅雀
message: "Plus... it's his fault my mom died."

name: 紅雀
message: "I know hating him won't bring anyone back. I really just wanted to forget it, you know? Let time heal my wounds and all that."

name: 紅雀
message: "But then he shows up like this, still doing the same old shit. How much am I supposed to take, huh?!"
Koujaku suddenly punches the wall. His fist trembles faintly.

name: 紅雀
message: "I just lose my shit when it comes to him. I don't even know what I'm doing. I even hurt you because of it."

name: 紅雀
message: "Trust me, I know how fucked up it is. But I've got these tattoos now, whether I like it or not. And that makes him my problem."

name: 紅雀
message: "As long he's still breathing, I'll never be free of the hate. ...That's why I'm putting an end to it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "An end?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah. This little game's gone on long enough."

name: 紅雀
message: "But I wanna be clear: this is my problem, not yours. I don't wanna bother you anymore."

name: 紅雀
message: "I'm gonna end this myse―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What do you take me for?"
I look straight into his eyes.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Did I ask you to keep me out of it?"
Koujaku looks down, perhaps ashamed.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Don't put words in my mouth. I've never thought you were bothering me. I still don't."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm... actually really glad you listened to me. Now I feel like I might actually be able to help you for once."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Thanks for telling me all that."

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba..."

<4line><voice name='蒼葉' class='蒼葉' src='voice/dm13/1000800a01'>
"You know, I had a dream about when we were kids. Haven't had one in a long time. It was night, and I was crying because Granny wasn't home yet, and you came to find me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You always came to find me, didn't you? It made me really happy. You were there when I needed you, just like a super―a dependable older brother."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But this time, I wanna be there for you. I mean, it's like you said. You can't know what's wrong if I don't say anything, so you had to ask until I gave it up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I figured I should take a page from your book. If you've got a problem, I'm gonna make sure you know that I'm there for you. That's what bros are for, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Besides, you're already involved in my mess. Why shouldn't I be involved in yours?"
I stop there and study Koujaku's face.
He's been frowning the whole time, but now he sighs and laughs.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Nah, I was just thinking about what I said before we came here. How I said you could tell me anything."

name: 紅雀
message: "Turns out I was the one keeping secrets. Pretty lame, huh?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess we're pretty similar. Don't know how to open up."

name: 紅雀
message: "I think you might be onto something there... You know, speaking of the good old days, I couldn't believe how you'd changed while I was gone."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Really? What do you mean?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, you were just so little when I left, and all grown up when I got back."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's kinda how it works."

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, yeah, but it was still a shock. You were like a totally different person."
Koujaku flashes me a tender smile.

name: 紅雀
message: "You probably didn't notice, but you weren't the only one trying to figure out where we stood."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess not..."

name: 紅雀
message: "We really are alike, huh?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "But me, I wasn't really all that surprised when I saw you again. You seemed pretty much the same."

name: 紅雀
message: "What?! I didn't mature at all?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I don't mean like that. It's like I said earlier, you were always looking out for me... You were my hero."

name: 紅雀
message: "Hero?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah. Got a problem with that?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Anyway, that's why I thought you hadn't changed, that you were still the same old Koujaku. I convinced myself everything would be like it was."

name: 紅雀
message: "...Nothing's changed, man. Nothing."
Koujaku looks at me affectionately.

name: 紅雀
message: "Sure, we were apart for a while, but all the important stuff's still the same."

name: 紅雀
message: "We just grew up, so now we have all this other bullshit to deal with. Underneath, I'm still the same old me, and you're still the same old Aoba. Right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Right."
I nod, and Koujaku offers his hand with a smile.

name: 紅雀
message: "Let's shake on it. Like we used to when we were kids, remember? We'd put our hands together like this and..."
Koujaku wraps his long, slender fingers around my hand.

name: 蒼葉
message: "And then you'd say..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "'Don't give up.'"

name: 紅雀
message: "I said that?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. I remember like it was yesterday. It was weird; whenever you'd say that, I'd feel a little braver."
He smiles bashfully.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Hm? What happened here?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Your neck's all red. Doesn't look like a bug bite. More like a mark from some kind of needle..."
